Case Study: Water Conservation
Our Wilmington, Ohio site recently upgraded its plant vacuum system to cross-connect the systems in the site’s two 
buildings such that the vacuum pump in one building could be turned off and could operate entirely off of excess capacity 
from the vacuum pump in the second building. This cross connection is expected to save the site approximately 9,000 m3 of 
water annually, equivalent to approximately 5% of the site’s annual use.
